short_summary: Canada Public Works and Government Services  National Defence Medical Centre Snow Removal and Grounds Maintenance
description: This procurement is for a snow removal and grounds maintenance service. The services must be provided to Public Services and Procurement Canada at the National Defence Medical Centre (NDMC).
full_summary:
================umno==

### Request for Proposal: Grounds Maintenance Services

**Reference Number:** WS3912245758-Doc3912436164
**Solicitation Number:** WS3912245758
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-13
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-25T14:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-05-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2028-04-30

**Opportunity Overview:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals from qualified bidders to provide Grounds Maintenance Services, including Snow Removal and Landscape Maintenance, for the National Defence Medical Centre (NDMC) in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Scope of Work:**
Services will include:

* Snow removal and salting
* Landscaping and grounds maintenance
* Labour, equipment, and material supply
* Supervision and transportation
* Compliance with all applicable regulations and standards

**Site Visit:**
A site visit has been scheduled for April 6, 2023, at 10:00 am. Bidders are required to attend and meet with the contracting authority in person. Arrangements can be made by contacting [**Shauna Barrett (SPAC/PSPC)**](mailto:shauna.barrett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) by April 4, 2023.

**Proposal Requirements:**
Bidders are expected to submit a proposal that includes:

* A detailed description of their services and capabilities
* A comprehensive plan for the scope of work
* A list of qualifications and experience
* A price proposal, including a detailed breakdown of costs
* Supporting documentation, including licenses and certifications

**Tender Status:**
This is an open bidding opportunity, and all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by the tender closing date.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact [**Shauna Barrett (SPAC/PSPC)**](mailto:shauna.barrett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or visit the [Canada Buys website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15662702?extsite=MTU2NjI3MDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Language of the Proposal:**
The language of the proposal must be English, except where a French translation is mandatory.

Note: This is a sample
